title: Series associated with a function defined as an integral part - b

content.description: Let f be the function given by \(f\left(t\right)=\frac{4}{1+t^2}\) and G be the function given by \(G\left(x\right)=\int_0^xf\left(t\right)\ dt\).
content.question: Find the first four nonzero terms and the general term for the power series expansion of G(x) about x=0.

frqParts.text: Find the first four nonzero terms and the general term for the power series expansion of G(x) about x=0.

topic.text: 10.15: (BC ONLY) Representing Functions as Power Series

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
